text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of 

Regional Roads) (Amendment) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road act 1993 (classification regional roads) (amendment) order 2024

title: on me by sections 8 and 10(1)(b) of the Roads Act 1993 (No. 14 of 1993),
heading: 2. The Roads Act 1993 (Classification of Regional Roads) Order 2012
text_raw:
2. The Roads Act 1993 (Classification of Regional Roads) Order 2012 

(S.I. No. 54 of 2012) is amended in the Schedule – 

(a) 

by the substitution of the following for the matter in column (2) 
opposite the mention of the regional road R428 in column (1): 

“Stradbally, County Laois – Athy, County Kildare 

Between its junction with N80 at The Green Stradbally in the 
county of Laois and its junction with N78 at Bennetsbridge, 
Athy in the county of Kildare via Ballykilcavan in the county of 
Laois: Blackford Bridge at the boundary between the county of 
Laois and the county of Kildare: Castlemitchell; Woodstock 
Street, William Street and Upper William Street at Athy in the 
county of Kildare.”, 

(b) by the substitution of the following for the matter in column (2) 

opposite the mention of the regional road R582 in column (1): 

“Ballydesmond, County Cork – Rathmore, County Kerry - 
Macroom, County Cork 

Between its junction with R577 at Glencollins Lower in the 
county of Cork and its junction with N72 at Main Street 
Rathmore in the county of Kerry via Scrahan, Knocknagree and 
Nohaval Upper in the county of Cork: Nohaval Bridge at the 
boundary between the county of Cork and the county of Kerry: 
and Cloonts in the county of Kerry 

and 

between its junction with N72 at Shinnagh Cross Rathmore in 
the county of Kerry and its junction with R618 at Gurteenroe 
Cross Macroom in the county of Cork via Inchibeg Bridge at the 
boundary between the county of Kerry and the county of Cork: 
Ballydaly Cross; Killarney Road, Coomlogane Street, Main 
Street and Church Street at Millstreet; Kilmeedy Bridge, Keel 
Bridge, Carriganimmy and Gurteenroe; and Milstreet Road at 
Macroom in the county of Cork.”, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [131] 3 

(c) 

by the substitution of the following for the matter in column (2) 
opposite the mention of the regional road R584 in column (1): 

“Macroom – Ballylickey, County Cork 

Between its junction with R618 at Sleveen East and its junction 
with N71 at Ballylickey Bridge via Hartnett's Cross (and 
including 
to N22 at Coolcour), Teergay, Kilbarry, 
Inchigeelagh, Graigue Bridge, Béal Átha an Ghaorthaidh, Doirín 
Dún Aodha, Bearnas Chéim an Fhia, Cappaboy Bridge, 
Carriganass Bridge and Breeney Beg all in the county of Cork.”, 

link 

and 

(d) by the substitution of the following for the matter in column (2) 

opposite the mention of the regional road R618 in column (1): 

“Carrigohane – Macroom - Ballyvourney, County Cork 

Between its junction with N22 at Carrigrohane in the city of 
Cork and its junction with N22 at An Sliabh Riabhach in the 
county of Cork via Leemount Cross and Garravagh in the city of 
Cork: Cannon’s Cross, Dripsey, Coachford, Glashagarriff 
Bridge, Carrigadrohid, Caum Cross and New Bridge; Cork 
Street, Railway View, Main Street, The Square, Castle Street, 
New Street, Gurteenroe Road and Killarney Road at Macroom; 
Carrigaphooca Bridge, Cúil an Bhuacaigh, Baile Mhic Íre and 
Baile Bhúirne in the county of Cork.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 March, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [131]

title: on me by sections 8 and 10(1)(b) of the Roads Act 1993 (No. 14 of 1993),
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order amends the Schedule of the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of 
Regional Roads) Order 2012 (S.I. No. 54 of 2012) to address road 
classification issues regarding a number of regional roads in County Cork, 
County Kerry, County Laois and County Kildare. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [131] 5
